| HistoryText             = The son of crimeboss [[Silvermane|Silvio "Silvermane" Manfredi]], [[Blackwing (Joseph Manfredi)|Joe Manfredi]] himself was the costumed supervillain known as [[Joseph Manfredi (Earth-616)|Blackwing]], but after his defeat by the [[Thunderbolts (Earth-616)|Thunderbolts]] as a member of the [[Masters of Evil|Masters of Evil VII]], Joe Manfredi decided to retire as a costumed supervillain, and stay on as crimeboss. He founded his own super-army: '''Heavy Mettle''' {{r|New Warriors Vol 2 #2|7}}

Several members of Heavy Mettle were later incorporated in the Secret Initiative under Norman Osborn's reign. During the mission in taking [[Prison 42]] from the remnants of King [[Blastaar (Earth-616)|Blastaar]]'s army, most of the members were killed.{{r|Avengers: The Initiative #27}}
